subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Less than a week after her first IndyCar victory, Danica Patrick put away her smile and went back to work, qualifying third for the I.R.L. race at Kansas Speedway. Scott Dixon and Dan Wheldon swept the front row in qualifying on the mile-and-a-half oval. Dixon took the top spot with a four-lap average of 213.956 m.p.h. Patrick nearly knocked him off with a consistent run of 213.225, but was bumped to the second row by Wheldon (213.641).
